channel.title: Software bites? on Vito Chin
channel.description: Recent content in Software bites? on Vito Chin

item.title: Attribution
item.description: Meta The custom theme for this website is forked from Hugo Future Imperfect SlimThe fork is here. There are quite a few subtle differences (the images doesn’t zoom when hovered for example). The Hugo Future Imperfect Slim theme itself is ported from HTML5 UP’s Future Imperfect. The eventual markups, supporting styles and JavaScript for this site is statically generated using Hugo. Photo credits Photos and images used as decorative banner for blogposts comes from Unsplash, as follows:
